programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''River of No Return, Part 1'' - The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle, and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''River of No Return, Part 2'' - A whitewater rafting trip turns deadly when Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, Shauni and CJ are pursued by the murderous miners that killed Mitch's uncle to get his map leading to the "Golden Boot" that Mitch and the others are now searching for.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Vacation, Part 1'' - The Baywatch lifeguards set sail on a romantic cruise, only to encounter a dangerous fugitive, who forces Mitch and Stephanie overboard into the stormy Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Vacation, Part 2'' - While on a vacation cruise, the Baywatch lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers, leaving Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the stormy Pacific, and Summer, Matt, CJ and Guido faced with outwitting ruthless killers who have overtaken the ship.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Shattered, Part 1'' - When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Pier Pressure'' - Hobie and Summer each find themselves torn between doing the right thing and giving in to dangerous social pressures.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Showdown at Malibu Beach High'' - Malibu Beach High students square off against the administration's plans to sell sacred Chumash Indian lands. And Garner quits the beach to work as a street cop again, only to be stuck in an office job by his vindictive captain.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Masquerade'' - Mitch and Stephanie board a yacht disguised as wealthy southern honeymooners to capture a group of modern-day pirates and find themselves oddly attracted to each other's undercover character.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Race Against Time, Part 1'' - Mitch's ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit. She introduces her new fiancé Ken and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie back to Ohio with her. When Ken's private jet crashes in the ocean on takeoff, the Baywatch team have to rescue them!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Race Against Time, Part 2'' - A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The Child Inside'' - The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.

programme.title: Philippines: Islands of Mystery
programme.desc: The Philippines are a chain of around 7,000 tropical islands in the Pacific. Plants-turned-predators line the edge of the forests, while rivers carve one of the world’s most spectacular cave systems.

programme.title: Vancouver Island: Rivers of Life
programme.desc: Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Glaciers fuel some of Canada’s tallest waterfalls, and a network of rivers provide the ideal habitat for the pacific salmon.

programme.title: Mike Siegel - Have Jokes, Will Travel
programme.desc: Mike Siegel is a stand-up comedian, TV host, and actor. For nine years, he hosted TBS network’s TBS Movie EXTRA and has hosted numerous other network shows including HGTV’s If Walls Could Talk and What You Get For the Money, GSN Live on the Game Show Network, and The Next GAC Star on GAC. Along with numerous appearances as a panelist on E! network’s hit show Chelsea Lately, Mike has performed stand-up comedy on many television shows, including Last Comic Standing (NBC), The Late Late Show (CBS), Late Friday (NBC), Comedy Showcase with Louie Anderson (NBC), Stand-up, Stand-up (Comedy Central), and Friday Night (NBC). Mike’s also been seen on the small screen as an actor. He was a recurring guest star on the CBS drama JAG, and had supporting roles in Mike and Molly (CBS), Rules of Engagement (ABC), 24 (FOX), Prison Break (FOX), Better Off Ted (ABC), Less Than Perfect (ABC), Eve (UPN), Strong Medicine (Lifetime), Andy Richter Controls the Universe (FOX), and Sabrina (WB).

programme.title: Key Lewis - Half Black, Half White, Looks Mexican
programme.desc: Sacramento California born Key Lewis is a high energy, improvisational, storytelling, multiple-personality nutcase! His love for the people and hunger for the stage is his undying motivation. His comedic stories about his interracial childhood, family, and unusual views on relationships, make Key simply a joy to watch. His ability to improvise and interact with all types of crowds makes this up and coming comic and actor one to look out for. Key Lewis has appeared on Marlon Wayans TBSís Funniest Wins, Starz Networks StaannDup, Kevin Harts One Mic Stand as well as Bill Bellamyís Whoís Got Jokes! Key says, chase your dream, always know your audience donít act funny, be funny... donít worry about the quantity of your material but the quality the sooner you create a relationship with your crowd, the better you will be. Television: Bill Bellamyís Whoís Got Jokes on TVONE. BETíS One Mic Stand Hosted by Kevin Hart. Starz Network Comedy Series called StaannDup, Marlon Wayanís TBSís Funniest Wins! Competitions: Winner of the 2013 Rocky Mountain Laugh Off, Finalist in the 2010 Bay Area Black Comedy Competition, Semi-Finalist 2009 San Francisco International Comedy Competition, a Semi-Finalist in the 2008 Boston Comedy Festival, 2007 Seattle International Comedy Competition Finalist, Shades of Laughs Portland Oregon Winner, TVONE Bill Bellamyís Who Got Jokeís Contestant. Radio: Improv work with FM Morning Shows (Top 40 Radio): KSFM 102.5 (Sacramento, CA), KWOD 106.5 (Sacramento, CA) KWIN 97.7 ñ Stockton/Lodi, CA, Mix 107.9 Salt Lake City UT (Is It Racist Segment) & The Man Panel. Concerts/Festivals: Opened for Jon B. and Keysha Cole, Taste Of Tacoma, & Bite Of Seattle Fountain Stage 5 Years Running! Key Lewis has worked with the likes of Kevin Hart, Pablo Francisco, Sam Bam, Alonzo Bodden, Jay London, Gabriel Iglesias, Brooks McBeth, Tommy Davidson, Katt Williams, De-Ray Davis, Andrew Norelli, Lonnie Love, Jeff Garcia, Damon Wayans, Joey Diaz, Guy Torry, Darren Carter, Paul Mooney, Kermet Apio and many more.

programme.title: Taylor Mason - Hysterical Perspective
programme.desc: Taylor Mason is your average, run-of-the-mill writer, performer, singer-songwriter, ventriloquist, comedian, entertainer, rock’n’roller, puppeteer, pianist, entertainer, and is here now for Dry Bar Comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Matt Knudsen - Good News
programme.desc: Matt Knudsen was born in Hawaii, raised in the Mid-west and sailed around the world as a merchant marine. As an actor, Matt shared the big screen with Oscar winner Sean Penn in Gangster Squad, or you may also recognize him from his appearances in shows like Crazy Ex-Girlfriend, Key & Peele, Workaholics, The League, Big Love, Boston Legal or Malcolm in the Middle just to name a few. Matt has also been a part of several high profile commercial campaigns for companies including: Apple, IBM, GE, Volkswagen, DirecTV, Pepsi and more which have aired during the Superbowl and The Olympics. As a comedian, he’s appeared on Conan, The Late Late Show, Last Call, ASX Live and Comics Unleashed, as well as dozens of festivals, including: Montreal Just for Laughs (Best of the Fest), The San Francisco Sketchfest, Bridgetown, High Plains, Limestone and has even entertained at The White House for President and Mrs. Obama.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Chelle T - It Just Got Real
programme.desc: As a mother of seven, Chelle T has seen it all, and shes not afraid to joke about it. Quippy and honest, Chelle T talks about how children are raised differently these days, menopause, being married for twenty-three years, and how desperate you sometimes become when youre a mom in this special.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Danny Villalpando - Too Informative
programme.desc: Danny has been performing stand up comedy for over sixteen years. He’s had the opportunity to work for many corporate events, charity organizations, and cruise ships. He has also had the privilege of working worldwide with the USO and Comic’s on Duty. His comedy has taken him such places as Japan, Singapore, Afghanistan, Panama, Honduras, Greenland, Iraq, Italy, and Greece.... just to name a few! In addition to headlining comedy clubs across the United States, Danny has also performed on television seventeen times. He’s been seen on NBC’s “Friday Night” as well as “The Latino Laugh Festival” and Comedy Central. Danny’s acting talents were also displayed as a bartender, on NBC’s “Meet My Folk’s.” Most recently he completed an independent film with Second City called "Time Share." Most of Danny’s comedy is based on his life experiences. Comedy fans described his act as the type of act you could do anywhere. From a bar, to corporate, it’s just funny!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:JJ Barrows - Doodle All Day
programme.desc: JJ Barrows was raised in South Carolina as the middle child of a preacher’s family. Having always felt a little different, JJ uses humor to navigate through the realities of life.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Kevin Downey Jr. - (Seriously), Please Pray for Me
programme.desc: New York City comedian and Las Vegas regular, Kevin Downey Jr. covers a wide variety of topics from reading a book on how to be a better comedian and why he doesn't drink anymore.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Kim Kerley - Do You Know Her?
programme.desc: Having spent much of her teens homeless, Kim Kerley has seen things in life that many never see. She’s chosen to find the funny in those situations. A keen observer of life’s crazy conditions, her comedy comes from real life. A regular on San Antonio Living, Kim has been performing stand-up comedy for over 13 years. She has traveled extensively in the U.S. and abroad, including an inspiring stint with Armed Forces Entertainment. She was also an actress with the comedy group, Laff Stock. She is an actor with Dramatic Diva Productions, putting on community plays in the San Antonio area. Kim also performed comedy on “The View”. She helmed San Antonio’s number 2 drive-time morning radio show. She also handled production duties for Cox Media in San Antonio and was also on the Y-100 morning show. She has shared the stages with comedy greats like Carlos Mencia, Ron White, Lewis Black and many others.

programme.title: Steve Soelberg - WE SAY BIM
programme.desc: Extremely funny comedian and overall nice person Steve Soelberg brings an observational, story telling style of comedy which has repeatedly left his regularly sold out audiences in stitches. Whether he's relating the experiences of growing up in a large family in Seattle, Washington or recounting the time he saw an angry guy in a tutu at a Ragnar relay, he has a way of making each audience member feel as if they were just the person he wanted to tell the story to because he knew they'd enjoy it just as much as he did. Due to his growing popularity as a comedian, he has appeared multiple times on local TV affiliates (Fox, KUTV, and KSL), on the radio, and has entertained tens of thousands traveling the country not only as comedian, but also as the voice of the Ragnar relay races as their race announcer and emcee. Steve's positive, upbeat personality paired with his observational, often self deprecating humor and his ability to appeal to a broad audience guarantee his shows will be a hilarious and memorable experience for all those who attend.

programme.title: Bengt Washburn - Poking a Grizzly
programme.desc: Bengt Washburn is an Aquarius with Hazel eyes who prefers boxer briefs, solid deodorants, and Crest toothpaste. He is 5’9? tall, weighs about 149 pounds and can bench 150 pounds three times without a spotter. He has a vertical leap of 16 inches. 8 years ago a lump appeared on his right thigh. It’s not visible from the stage but according to some kids at the water park, it looks creepy. Many people say Bengt looks kind of like a monkey. Bengt Washburn was born in Salt Lake City, Utah but grew up in a large Utah town (1,200 people) as the fifth child in a small Mormon family (7 children). Bengt is married to an officer in the United States Airforce. They have lived in 6 different cities over the last eleven years. Most recently he moved to Springfield, Virginia (Washington D.C.) after living in Stuttgart, Germany for 3 years. Bengt is a former winner of the prestigious San Francisco International Comedy Competition. He has been seen on The Late Late Show with Craig Fergusen, Live at Gotham on Comedy Central and most recently Conan on TBS. He was invited to perform at the Vancouver International Comedy Festival, The Boston Comedy Festival, the Aspen Laff Festival and Gilda’s Laugh Fest in Grand Rapids, Michigan. He’s been heard on NPR, PRI and Bob and Tom. All three of his comedy Cd’s can be heard playing on XM Sirius radio. Most people who know him would say Bengt is a logistically impaired ditz, but his comedy is described as intelligent, surprisingly universal considering the content matter and profoundly funny.

programme.title: Kevin Jordan - Cause I Said So
programme.desc: A Former Los Angeles Police Officer, Kevin has thrilled audiences at Clubs, on Cruise ships, and for the troops worldwide. Kevin is also an Award-winning author, who has opened for John Legend and Gladys Knight.

programme.title: CarGo
programme.desc: A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father - who's been sent to Clunker Island to be repurposed as junk metal.

programme.title: Dragonquest
programme.desc: After the ruthless Krill (Brian Thompson) harnesses the power of a deadly fire-breathing dragon, he begins a bloody campaign of world domination. From the ashes of a scorched village, Arkadi (Daniel Bonjour), an unassuming farm boy, embarks on an arduous journey to restore the lost pieces of a mystical amulet -- the only weapon powerful enough to destroy Krill. With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.title: Jane White is Sick and Twisted
programme.desc: Jane White (Kim Little) is a disturbed young woman living in her own bizarre TV fantasy land. For Jane, life itself is a television program, and she dreams of becoming a star on the small screen. Convincing herself that Gerry King (David L. Lander), a popular talk show host, is her birth father, she sets out on an adventurous road trip -- aided by her equally looney boyfriend, Dick (Wil Wheaton) -- to confront her "father" on the air, and, just maybe, make a splash on reality television.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Giant Octopus
programme.desc: Strange things are afoot in the depths of the sea. First a passenger plane vanishes over the Pacific Ocean. Then an oil platform is obliterated. Marine biologist Emma MacNeil (Deborah Gibson) is dispatched to investigate the phenomena, and, with the help of Japanese scientist Seiji Shimada (Vic Chao), she makes a discovery that will rock the world: An enormous prehistoric shark and a giant octopus have been awakened from their icy slumbers -- and they're hungry.

programme.title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons
programme.desc: Before growing into the legendary adviser to the Pendragons, a youthful Merlin spends his days studying with the Mage (Jürgen Prochnow), a master sorcerer, and honing his magical skills. When a fellow apprentice sorcerer, Hengest (Iago McGuire), grows jealous of Merlin's rapid progress, he rebels against their mutual mentor and betrays King Vortigen (Hefin Wyn) to Saxon invaders. As Hengest conjures an army of dragons, Merlin prepares to test his developing abilities in battle.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: In this modern retelling of the classic horror tale, teen siblings are enslaved by a psychotic recluse within her gruesome house of horrors in the woods.

programme.title: ALTER Collection | Run From Tomorrow
programme.desc: The future freaks us out, and it should scare you too.

programme.title: Automata | Full Series
programme.desc: In an alternate 1930's New York City, private eye Sam Regal and his incredibly smart automaton partner, Carl Swangee investigate a murder. Directed by Van Alan

programme.title: Into the Great Beyond... Beyond | Episode 1
programme.desc: Young Stewart Lipinski is made captain of an exploratory space mission into space...his older sister Karen is made his second in command, and is none too happy about it. When their ship and crew stumble into a different universe with no way home, Stewart and Karen have to figure out their differences in order to survive.

programme.title: Getting to Know You | Episode 2
programme.desc: In an attempt to raise the morale of his frightened and fudge-riddled crew, Stewart initiates a bonding session that devolves into ice-breaker games. When Karen discovers that one of the crew members is actually an alien who's implanted memories in their heads, they play a high-stakes game of Mafia to weed out the intruder.

programme.title: The Death of A.R.T. | Episode 3
programme.desc: The crew prepares a video to broadcast to anyone that might be listening in space. ART gets knocked off the ship and then saves the crew when a planet starts to form around the ship.

programme.title: Ted Talks | Episode 4
programme.desc: Tina finds a way to get dumped by her Earthbound boyfriend despite having no contact with Earth. The ship turns out to be infested with spyware, but not the way you would think.

programme.title: Trouble's Brewing | Episode 5
programme.desc: Kent, Art and Natasha demand human privileges, but a coffee maker hijacks their robot revolution and takes over the ship. Meanwhile, time distortion turns Tina and Michael's half-day mission into a year-long ordeal on a barren planet.

programme.title: Powerless | Episode 6
programme.desc: With the ship trapped in a lightning storm, Karen struggles to persuade the crew to limit their power usage, while Stewart learns to pilot the ship manually with help from Zalian. Meanwhile, Kent attempts to re-educate Natasha, who has been reduced to the mental age of a child after the first lightning strike.

programme.title: First Contact | Episode 7
programme.desc: An alien appears in Stewart's dreams, but only seems to communicate if Stewart's dreams are erotic in nature. Stewart enlists both A.R.T. and Zalian's medicine cabinet in a dark, humiliating journey to make first contact. Karen slaps Michael in a rage over his tryst with Tina, and has to go undergo HR arbitration, overseen by an un-objective Tina.

programme.title: Finale | Episode 8
programme.desc: The crew makes contact with an alien at long last, but this historic moment is cut short when they realize they have a chance to make it home through an interplanetary ripple. Stewart and Michael decide to stay behind to learn more about the alien's culture, only to be underwhelmed - when they return, Karen chews them out for their mistake. Meanwhile, Tina uses Zalian, A.R.T., holograms, sedatives, and magnets to give Kent and Natasha their first and only date. Both groups are ripped from their activities by a series of shocking revelations about the universe.
